ingredients: +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste, 3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste, 2  limes, juiced, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 pinch chili powder, or more to taste (Optional),   salt to taste
